name: Tennis Coaching - Training Academy for PRO
name_original: Tennis Coaching - Training Academy for PRO
description:
Learn the Tennis with Accuracy.
FEATURES
* HD professional videos.
* Video Analysis and comparison.
* Maintain daily performance's record.
* Learn all the Tennis skills.

TENNIS Coaching PRO present the v1.0 of Tennis Coaching PRO for the users of iPhone & iPad to learn the Tennis diffrenetly. Beginners and professionals can practice these shots and skills.
* ForeHand.
* Backhand.
* Flat Serve.
* Volley.
* TopSpin.
* Kick Serve.
* Half Volley.
* Slice Serve.
* Drop Shot.
* Passing Shot.
* Approach Shot and much more.

Then you can compare your performance by recording your video and after comparing with these videos, you will definitely realize where to improve yourself as a PRO TENNIS player and you can store your daily data also.

Download and become a PRO TENNIS player.
